name: Vietnam War PuZZles
description: This is a logical game in which you need to collect puzzles on the Vietnamese theme.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7\8\10 Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series, 1GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 2.0) Storage: 260 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
